00001 #include "PropertyMap.h"
00002 #include "LogManager.h"
00003 
00004 #include "../tinyxml/tinyxml.h"
00005 using namespace std;
00006 
00007 namespace jvgs
00008 {
00009     namespace core
00010     {
00011         void PropertyMap::loadData(TiXmlElement *element)
00012         {
00013             TiXmlElement *entry = element->FirstChildElement("entry");
00014             while(entry) {
00015 
00016                 if(!entry->Attribute("key"))
00017                     LogManager::getInstance()->error(
00018                             "A key should always be defined in a map!");
00019 
00020                 string key = entry->Attribute("key");
00021 
00022                 string value = entry->Attribute("value") ?
00023                         entry->Attribute("value") : "1";
00024 
00025                 entries[key] = value;
00026                 entry = entry->NextSiblingElement("entry");
00027             }
00028         }
00029 
00030         PropertyMap::PropertyMap()
00031         {
00032         }
00033 
00034         PropertyMap::PropertyMap(TiXmlElement *element)
00035         {
00036             load(element);
00037         }
00038 
00039         PropertyMap::PropertyMap(const string &fileName)
00040         {
00041             load(fileName);
00042         }
00043 
00044         PropertyMap::~PropertyMap()
00045         {
00046         }
00047 
00048         bool PropertyMap::isSet(const string &key)
00049         {
00050             map<string, string>::iterator result = entries.find(key);
00051             return result != entries.end();
00052         }
00053 
00054         string PropertyMap::get(const string &key)
00055         {
00056             map<string, string>::iterator result = entries.find(key);
00057             return result != entries.end() ? result->second : "";
00058         }
00059 
00060         bool PropertyMap::get(const string &key, string *value)
00061         {
00062             map<string, string>::iterator result = entries.find(key);
00063             if(result != entries.end()) {
00064                 (*value) = result->second;
00065                 return true;
00066             } else {
00067                 return false;
00068             }
00069         }
00070 
00071         bool PropertyMap::getBool(const string &key)
00072         {
00073             map<string, string>::iterator result = entries.find(key);
00074             return result != entries.end() ? result->second == "true" : false;
00075         }
00076 
00077         void PropertyMap::set(const string &key, const string &value)
00078         {
00079             entries[key] = value;
00080         }
00081 
00082         void PropertyMap::setBool(const string &key, bool value)
00083         {
00084             entries[key] = value ? "true" : "false";
00085         }
00086 
00087         void PropertyMap::write(const string &fileName)
00088         {
00089             TiXmlDocument document(fileName.c_str());
00090             TiXmlElement root("propertymap");
00091 
00092             for(map<string, string>::iterator iterator = entries.begin();
00093                     iterator != entries.end(); iterator++) {
00094                 TiXmlElement element("entry");
00095                 element.SetAttribute("key", iterator->first.c_str());
00096                 element.SetAttribute("value", iterator->second.c_str());
00097                 root.InsertEndChild(element);
00098             }
00099 
00100             document.InsertEndChild(root);
00101             if(!document.SaveFile())
00102                 LogManager::getInstance()->error(
00103                         "Could not save to %s", fileName.c_str());
00104         }
00105     }
00106 }
